title: swiftDialog Inspect Mode Configuration
description: Configuration schema for swiftDialog's Inspect mode presets (preset1-preset9)

preset.description: The preset layout to use. Each preset has three aliases: preset1/1/deployment (full layout), preset2/2/cards (card grid), preset3/3/compact (minimal list), preset4/4/compliance (plist monitoring), preset5/5/dashboard (status dashboard), preset6/6/guidance/modern-sidebar (modern sidebar wizard), preset7/7/guide (multi-page guide), preset8/8/onboarding (image carousel), preset9/9/display (detailed content viewer), preset11/11/portal (self-service portal with WebView)

iconBasePath.description: Base path for relative icon paths

overlayicon.description: Overlay icon for brand identity badges (lowercase variant)

overlayIcon.description: Overlay icon for brand identity badges (camelCase variant)

banner.description: Banner image path (overrides icon in some presets)

sideInterval.description: Side message rotation interval in seconds

finalButtonText.description: Button text when all items complete

observeOnly.description: Global observe-only mode - disables all user interactions

autoAdvanceOnComplete.description: Preset6: Auto-navigate to next step after marking complete

showCompletionState.description: Show green when all steps complete

rotatingImages.description: Array of image paths for rotation

actionPipe.description: Optional FIFO path for instant script request delivery

items.description: Array of item configurations (used by preset1-9)

introSteps.description: Array of intro steps for Preset11 intro wizard flow

navigationItems.description: Array of navigation items for Preset6/11 sidebar navigation

accentBorderColor.description: Top accent border color for branded presets (hex format, e.g., '#DC0A15')

footerTextColor.description: Footer text color (hex format, for dark backgrounds)

supportText.description: Optional support contact text in footer

paths.description: File paths to monitor for validation

status.description: Status icon for list items (supports dynamic updates)

banner.description: Banner image path for card-style presets

plistRecheckInterval.description: Interval in seconds to recheck plist (0 = once)

useUserDefaults.description: Use UserDefaults for instant notification-based monitoring

guidanceContent.description: Rich content blocks for the step

actionButtonText.description: Custom button text for this step's action

continueButtonText.description: Custom button text after step completes

finalButtonText.description: Custom button text when step is complete

processingDuration.description: Duration in seconds for processing steps

blocking.description: Mark item as blocking further progress

required.description: Mark item as required for completion

gradientColors.description: Custom gradient colors for this card

keyPointsText.description: Custom paragraph text for Key Points section (Preset9)

successMessage.description: Message shown when step completes successfully

waitWarningTime.description: Show warning after X seconds waiting

waitSmallOverrideTime.description: Show small override link after X seconds

waitLargeOverrideTime.description: Show large override button after X seconds

processingMode.description: Processing mode: simple auto-completes, progressive waits for triggers

waitForExternalTrigger.description: Never auto-complete - always wait for success:/failure: command

plistMonitors.description: Plist monitors that auto-update guidance components

jsonMonitors.description: JSON monitors that auto-update guidance components

portalURL.description: Override portal URL for this block (uses global portalConfig if nil)

portalHeight.description: Height of embedded portal view in points

portalShowHeader.description: Show portal header bar with refetch button

portalOfflineMessage.description: Custom message when portal is offline

id.description: Unique identifier for storing user input

required.description: Whether this input is required for step completion

helpText.description: Help text displayed in info popover

discreteSteps.description: Array of discrete step values with labels for slider. When defined, slider snaps to these values instead of continuous range.

shell.description: Shell command to execute (for action: shell)

shellTimeout.description: Timeout in seconds for shell command

requestId.description: Abstract identifier for script callback (for action: request)

style.description: Display style for phase-tracker or progress-bar

cardIcon.description: SF Symbol icon for card header

bentoColumns.description: Number of columns in bento grid

bentoRowHeight.description: Base row height in points for bento grid

bentoGap.description: Gap between cells in points for bento grid

wallpaperCategories.description: Categories of wallpapers to choose from

blockIndex.description: Index in guidanceContent array to update
Index in guidanceContent array to update

key.description: Plist key to monitor (supports dot notation)

guidanceBlockIndex.description: Index of guidance component to update (0-based)

key.description: JSON key path to monitor (supports dot notation)

guidanceBlockIndex.description: Index of guidance component to update (0-based)

getStartedSubtitle.default: Follow the steps to complete setup

checksPassed.description: Format for 'X of Y checks passed' (use {passed}, {total})

icon.description: SF Symbol or image path for header

wide.description: Use wider overlay dimensions (900-1100 instead of default 720-880)

PortalConfig.description: Self-service portal configuration with optional authentication. URL can be provided via portalURL or portalURLFile.

portalURL.description: Base URL of the self-service portal (fallback if portalURLFile not found)

portalURLFile.description: Path to file containing portal URL. Read at launch, overrides portalURL. Useful for dynamic device-specific URLs set by external scripts.

tokenRefreshInterval.description: Refresh token X seconds before expiry

retryDelay.description: Base delay between retries in seconds

fallbackMessage.description: Message shown when portal is unavailable

supportContact.description: Contact info shown when portal is offline (e.g., phone, email, Slack channel)

userAgent.description: Custom User-Agent for web requests (e.g., 'swiftdialog.self-service/1.0'). Allows web services to detect and provide optimized views.

clientCertSubject.description: Client certificate subject for mTLS authentication. Selects certificate from keychain by matching subject name.

staticToken.description: Direct bearer token value (e.g., for Cloudflare)

clientCertIdentity.description: Common name of client certificate in keychain (for mTLS)

AppConfigSource.description: MDM AppConfig source for dynamic branding overrides. Maps MDM managed preference keys to existing InspectConfig branding fields.

domain.description: Preference domain (e.g., 'com.company.branding'). Defaults to app bundle identifier.

supportURLKey.description: MDM key for support URL override

IntroStep.description: An intro wizard step for Preset11

content.description: Rich content blocks for the step

NavigationItem.description: A sidebar navigation item for Preset6/11

BentoCellConfig.description: Configuration for a bento grid cell

sfSymbol.description: SF Symbol name for icon content type

detailOverlay.description: Optional detail overlay shown when cell is clicked
